p: The fraction of ethyl acetate extracted from A. conyzoides possesses antimicrobial activities on uropathogenic E. coli and K. pneumoniae collected from District 2 Hospital, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam. This fraction is the potential to apply for healthcare serum in prophylactic recurrence UTIs. T. erecta showed the highest potent in DPPH radical scavenging assay, which could become a good candidate for the antioxidative agent in food and cosmetic products.
